QuestData.Title: Ascended
QuestData.Description:
With success over their trials, our aspirants shall now start the next chapter of their afterlives.
They have proven themselves through eons of training and cleansing, and will now earn ascendance.
As each aspirant is called, I ask you and Pelagos to please assist by ushering them up. It is a tradition we have practiced for eons, reinforcing the bonds that we share.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Pelagos with the ascension ceremony.
